# Py HaloInfiniteResearch Lib

This package contains scripts, models, tags and other files relating to the research of Halo Infinite's tags and files.

# Legal

Halo Infinite Â© Microsoft Corporation. Py HaloInfiniteResearch Core was created under Microsoft's "Game Content Usage Rules" using assets from Halo Infinite, and it is not endorsed by or affiliated with Microsoft.
